frontmatter.title: CS 265 Is Now A Large Lecture

node.excerpt: Another computer science core class has changed to the large lecture format. This semester, CSCI 265 Computer Theory I will be offered twice a week as a 200-student synchronous online lecture. In previous semesters, it was offered as multiple sections of about 30 students each. In fall 2020, the cl…

frontmatter.title: Github Responds to Request to Take Down 'youtube-dl' Library

node.excerpt: Github  reinstated  on Monday the  youtube-dl  repository, a popular Python library used to download youtube videos and audio.  Github is a web platform that hosts code repositories. Github was purchased by Microsoft in 2018 for  $7.5 billion . Some of the code hosted on Github is free for anyone t…

frontmatter.title: 7 Ways To Explain APIs to Supreme Court Justices

node.excerpt: Suppose you are a lawyer arguing a technical case to the Supreme Court. You are standing in an 85 year-old neo-classical building. my.description: Max Zlotskiy is a student at Hunter College studying film and computer science. He founded The Icarus in his junior year.
